dimensions.label: Perception of Humor
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin perceive humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will find irony and sarcasm amusing, often responding with witty one-liners.
Your FarTwin will enjoy slapstick humor and silly jokes, often laughing at the most absurd things.

dimensions.label: Group Dynamics
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interact with a group?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge and lead the conversation, often dominating discussions.
Your FarTwin will listen actively and work together with others to find a collective solution.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex issues into logical steps, using data and evidence to inform decisions.
Your FarTwin will rely on instincts and instincts-based decision-making, often trusting their gut feeling over analysis.

dimensions.label: Career Ambition
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach career advancement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set high goals and work hard to achieve them, often taking risks to advance their career.
Your FarTwin will prioritize stability and security, often choosing more traditional career paths with predictable outcomes.

dimensions.label: Global Perspective
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin view the world?

options.description: Your FarTwin will believe that the world is a better place, often taking a positive and idealistic approach to global issues.
Your FarTwin will be skeptical of global progress and institutions, often viewing the world with a pessimistic lens.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin absorb new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn best through images, videos, and visual aids, often needing to see the material to understand it.
Your FarTwin will prefer listening to lectures or discussions, often understanding complex concepts better through auditory explanations.

dimensions.label: Digital Literacy
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly comfortable using digital tools and platforms, often using them to enhance their work or daily life.
Your FarTwin will have a basic understanding of technology, but may struggle with more complex applications or software.

dimensions.label: Time Management
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize tasks?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be highly structured and organized, often prioritizing efficiency and productivity above all else.
Your FarTwin will have a more flexible approach to time management, often taking breaks and prioritizing personal well-being.
